item.description: In this weekly meetup we will be listening to teacher and storyteller Jack Kornfield as he joins Sylvia Boorstein in this talk from 1995. In his clear and humorous way, Jack presents to us the primary principles we must integrate if we want to be awake and truly happy in our lives. Join us in mindful community as we explore the great messages of mindfulness through the wisdom of two master teachers. We'll also have time for a short group meditation and discussion about the talk. All levels of mindful explorers are welcome. Hope to see you then.
item.name: What Keeps Us Awake and Happy?
